A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Star Wars: The Last Jedi ... Hopefully the last movie. I went into the theater expecting a darker Star Wars movie\, major space battles\, some epic force using by Luke\, finding out who Snoke is but what I got was far from that. "SPOILER ALERT"



Snoke was completely cut from the plot\, never finding out who he was or where he came from or what he planned
Luke was turned into a coward that barely resembles a Jedi. I was hoping that he possibly bridged both the dark and light sides and taught from that stand point\, but nooo! He was ruined.
Really only one or two cool moments of combat\, but mostly a running dialog of political correctness and anti-capitalism. Movies are supposed to be an escape\, not a platform for your political views.
But besides that\, the movie has what the last one has\, characters that are poorly developed and no one cares about\, poor writing\, poor villains\, shockingly poor heroes/heroines\, SJW bull crap\, and no story arc.
